if(EXISTS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/physx_3.3.3.zip)
	file(MD5 ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/physx_3.3.3.zip HASH)
	if(NOT HASH STREQUAL 367495e8b0ec4ff4f05a20ae4b6aa789)
		message(ERROR "PhysX package not found or has different MD5 hash")
	else()
		message(STATUS "PhysX package found")
	endif()
else()
	message(STATUS "Please place physx_3.3.3.zip into directory ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}")
endif()
